Created by \n\nJaeseok Huh\nAdrian Steffan
Meet Cancel
Found you
Hey there!\nI am Cupee, your very handsome AI companion :) Together, we will walk through a typical interaction in Cupeer! Cupeer enables you to find nearby people to meet and talk to, all without requiring an internet connection. Press the DISCOVER button to start looking for nearby users!
Great, you found me! Next, we will both take this fun little personality quiz.\n\nI bet we will be a great match!
In this screen, you can compare your answers to the ones you partner gave. Based on these, you can decide if this is a person you would want to meet!
Hmm, interesting answers :D Normally, we would use this chat to find each other and meet up. Unfortunately I am not a real person yet, so this will have to wait :( Anyway, to end the chat after meeting the other person, use the button at the top. I hope you will enjoy using Cupeer!
